title: # Protect The Bullied

replies.body:
We have a system in place already. There are two actions you can take.

Mute them so you don't have to listen.

Report them so no one else has to listen either.
Yeah but some people don't mute and sometimes those who do it don't get caught just trying to raise a little awareness.
What more awareness do people need? Assholes exist. Riot can't get rid of assholes completely, and systems are in place to deal with people who can't follow the rules.

"deal with accounts that can't follow the rules"

more accurately. but otherwise gatekeeper is totes on point. its up to us to overcome.

Rito should give me a replay of a muted player's chat only when the game ends so I know if I should report him. Because if I mute someone whom I know is going to be a crying monkey all game (easy signs are feeding as a top laner and pinging your jungle), I have no evidence of him being toxic at all and he will keep doing that the next games if everyone insta mutes him.
Anyone who actually does that is on a fast track to getting banned. Mute and report.
